text:
Keselgaspe Manatunga Jayalath Manoratne (; 12 June 1948 – 12 January 2020) was a Sri Lankan actor. He appeared in movies, television and on stage. He had roles in "Doo Daruwo", "Handaya" and "Hiripoda Wassa". He was born in Nuwara Eliya.
Manoratne died of brain cancer on 12 January 2020 in Maharagama, Colombo. He was 71.
